Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2015...
Struck out 15 batters against Detroit on 9/23/2015...
Injured on 8/30/2016 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/2017 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Traded from Philadelphia to Cincinnati on 7/30/2019 (Going to PHI: 3B Edward Clinard, P Jose Mejia. Going to CIN: P Benjamin Berg)...
